emuInput.TitMainTitle: Bernice Utterback, Mrs. Arthur Nikolas, and Helen M. Brennan, standing at table with light colored tablecloth, in William Penn Hotel for PTA Conference
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 25, 1953, pg. 2, reads: "At Southwest PTA Conference - The Southwestern Pennsylvania Conference of Parent Teacher Association was held at the William Penn Hotel last Saturday. Shown during the sessions are, right photo: Mrs. Everett Utterback, Mrs. Arthur Nikolas, and Miss Helen M. Brennan, information aides.-Harris Photos."
